articles.title: Four-yearly Club World Cup on way as part of rugby's Champions Cup shake-up - Independent.ie
articles.description: Outgoing Chairman Simon Halliday says European Professional Club Rugby (EPCR) is working on the inclusion of South African teams in next year's Heineken Champions Cup and is planning to stage a Club World Cup every four years.

articles.title: Soaring energy prices climb up EU's political agenda - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union said on Wednesday it would examine the way its power market is run and consider proposals to revamp regulations within the bloc, as it seeks to keep plans to tackle climate change on track amid record-high energy costs.

articles.title: French fishermen threaten Christmas blockade of UK imports and supplies in post-Brexit row - The Independent
articles.description: France’s Europe minister said they ‘would not be pushed around’ as row over post-Brexit fishing licences intensifies
articles.content:
